device_name.description: The name of the device on the node (sde, sdg, etc).

volume_type.description: The storage type on EBS (gp2, etc).

volume_size.description: The size of the storage, in gigabytes.

delete_on_termination.description: Whether or not to delete the volume after the node is terminated.

snapshot_id.description: The id of a snapshot to recover from.

encrypted.description: Whether or not the volume is encrypted within AWS.
